src:
4樣危險禁品不要亂扔 容易發生爆炸（視頻）

02 Nov 2019, 04:38

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月02日訊】垃圾亂扔會爆炸！
第一類：有機溶劑噴霧罐第二類：食用性粉狀物第三類：鋰電池第四類：金紙或香灰餘燼
以下YouTube視頻示範：



（責任編輯：張信燕） 本文網址: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/02/a102698607.html
text:
4 dangerous prohibited products should not be littered, easy to explode (video)

02 Nov 2019, 04:38

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 02, 2019] Garbage litter will explode!
The first category: organic solvent spray cans, the second category: edible powder, the third category: lithium batteries, the fourth category: gold paper or incense ash
The following YouTube video demo:
